overview: Skate and Destroy. Yeah, it's about breakin' windows, yellin' and screamin', scarin' people, terrorizin', high volume, rollin' fast, runnin' stop lights, gettin' some, playin' it loud, hootin', hollerin', fuggin', druggin', throwin' rocks, up yours, hell fire, cross town, all night, anywhere, anytime, hit it and quit, eat or be eaten, get up and do it again. Yeah, right. Skate and Destroy is about skatin' ... all out ... or not at all.
title: Thrasher - Skate and Destroy
